name: URemeshMeshToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the Remesh operation

bDiscardAttributes: Discard UVs and existing normals, allowing the remesher to ignore any UV and normal seams. New per-vertex normals are computed.
bShowGroupColors: Display colors corresponding to the mesh's polygon groups
MaxRemeshIterations: Maximum number of Remeshing passes, for Remeshers that have convergence criteria
ExtraProjectionIterations: For NormalFlowRemesher: extra iterations of normal flow with no remeshing
bUseTargetEdgeLength: If true, the target count is ignored and the target edge length is used directly
TargetEdgeLength: Remesh to have edges approximately this length. An attempt at a reasonable value is computed automatically for this field based on the selected target mesh.
bReproject: Enable projection back to input mesh
bReprojectConstraints: Project constrained vertices back to original constraint curves
BoundaryCornerAngleThreshold: Angle threshold in degrees for classifying a boundary vertex as a corner. Corners will be fixed if Reproject Constraints is active.
